narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Loma Linda University Children's Hospital is a General Acute Care Hospital  Children provider based in Loma Linda, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $107.1M in Medicaid payments across 1.3M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $107.1M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,387 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
